package.name: gcc_pass2
package.unpack:
tar xf ${SRCDIR}/gcc-${PKGVERSION}.tar.xz tar xf ${SRCDIR}/mpfr-4.0.2.tar.xz tar xf ${SRCDIR}/gmp-6.1.2.tar.lz tar xf ${SRCDIR}/mpc-1.1.0.tar.gz
mv -v mpc-1.1.0 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/mpc mv -v gmp-6.1.2 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/gmp mv -v mpfr-4.0.2 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/mpfr mkdir -v gcc-build
package.patch:
cd gcc-${PKGVERSION} cat gcc/limitx.h gcc/glimits.h gcc/limity.h > `dirname $($LFS_TGT-gcc -print-libgcc-file-name)`/include-fixed/limits.h
#for file in \ # $(find gcc/config -name linux64.h -o -name linux.h -o -name sysv4.h) for file in gcc/config/{linux,i386/linux{,64}}.h do cp -uv $file{,.orig} sed -e 's@/lib\(64\)\?\(32\)\?/ld@/tools&@g' \ -e 's@/usr@/tools@g' $file.orig > $file echo ' #undef STANDARD_STARTFILE_PREFIX_1 #undef STANDARD_STARTFILE_PREFIX_2 #define STANDARD_STARTFILE_PREFIX_1 "/tools/lib/" #define STANDARD_STARTFILE_PREFIX_2 ""' >> $file touch $file.orig done
case $(uname -m) in x86_64) sed -e '/m64=/s/lib64/lib/' \ -i.orig gcc/config/i386/t-linux64 ;; esac
package.build:
cd gcc-build
#ARMFLOAT='' #ARMFPU='' JOBS=4
# Settings for Raspberry Pi #case ${LFS_TGT} in # *armv6l*) # ARMFLOAT="--with-float=hard" # ARMFPU="--with-fpu=vfp" # JOBS=1 # ;; #esac
CC=$LFS_TGT-gcc \ CXX=$LFS_TGT-g++ \ AR=$LFS_TGT-ar \ RANLIB=$LFS_TGT-ranlib \ ../gcc-${PKGVERSION}/configure \ --prefix=/tools \ --with-local-prefix=/tools \ --with-native-system-header-dir=/tools/include \ --enable-languages=c,c++ \ --disable-libstdcxx-pch \ --disable-multilib \ --disable-bootstrap \ --disable-libgomp
# Fix build on RaspberryPi #case $LFS_TGT in # armv6l*) # sed -i 's/none-/armv6l-/' Makefile # ;; #esac make -j $JOBS
package.install: cd gcc-build make install ln -vs gcc /tools/bin/cc # ln -sv /tools/lib/libgcc_s.so{,.1} ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/lib # ln -sv /tools/lib/libstdc++.so{,.6} ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/lib echo 'main(){}' > dummy.c cc dummy.c readelf -l a.out | grep ': /tools'
